item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR COMBINATION LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the connector clamp to install the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL TAIL AND STOP LIGHT BULB

s2.ptxt: Install the tail and stop light bulb to the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH.
Turn the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to install the socket.
Install the back up light bulb to the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH.
Turn the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to install the socket.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR TURN SIGNAL LIGHT BULB

s2.ptxt: Install the rear turn signal light bulb to the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH.
Turn the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to install the socket.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR COMBINATION LIGHT GASKET LH

s2.ptxt: Install a new rear combination light gasket LH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR COMBINATION LIGHT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Install the 2 bolts to install the rear combination light assembly LH.
